trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Haven
There were no other sightings in South Haven on or around September 5th 2013
Summary: looking straight up,triangular object reflected(sunlight?)dimmed several times,then faded from view
divs: Sighting Detailsi was watching what i believed to be a satellite traveling overhead in a southeasterly direction,when i was surprised by a larger triangular object that appeared in my field of vision following a short distance behind it! i noticed it get brighter and then fade several times as it continued on its southeasterly path. it seemed to move smoothly,and unwaveringly as it passed,and just appeared to become enveloped into the darkness of the night sky. i strained to make out details but could only ascertain its' triangular shape! i personally felt that the object i was witnessing was beyond our atmosphere,and like the satellite that preceded it,the object was reflecting light from our sun! from a 12 o-clock high beginning of the sighting,to about a 2 o-clock high ending,the event took about 25 seconds!
